hero.title: Java Full Stack Engineer
hero.subtitle: Building scalable backend systems and intelligent AI-powered solutions.

about.title: About Me
about.content: Java Full Stack Developer with 5+ years of experience building scalable applications using Java, Spring Boot, Spring Security, and RESTful APIs within microservices-based architectures. Skilled in developing responsive front-end interfaces with Angular and React, supported by robust backend services and optimized database design using PostgreSQL. Experienced in CI/CD pipelines with Jenkins. Created conversational chatbots using Azure Bot Service and integrated Python Django–based chatbots with TensorFlow and Keras LLM models.

tcs.h1: Resolved 20+ defects per release cycle in an Agile environment.
tcs.h2: Developed 20+ applications features using Java, Spring Boot, and Angular.
tcs.h3: Built an AI-powered chatbot using Python Django and LLMs, reducing manual query handling by 30-40%.
tcs.h4: Designed Relational database schemas in PostgreSQL with Hibernate.
tcs.h5: Reduced manual release effort by 30-40% using integrated GitLab CI/CD pipelines.
tcs.h6: Authored unit test suites with 100% code coverage.

spikewell.h1: Engineered healthcare conversational system with Azure Bot Service.
spikewell.h2: Reduced patient wait times by 35% through encrypted data flows.
spikewell.h3: Produced Power BI dashboards increasing reporting efficiency by 50%.

ctrtc.h2: Achieved 90–95% imitation accuracy in lane-tracking simulations.

recipe.title: Recipe Generator
recipe.tech: Java, Spring AI, React, Ollama Gemma
recipe.description: An AI-powered recipe generation platform that integrates the Ollama Gemma model via Spring AI. Features include prompt handling, inference orchestration, and a responsive React UI for personalized recipe suggestions.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.availability_text: Currently open to new opportunities and collaborations in Java Backend, Cloud ML, and AI solutions.
